whatIs.title: What is Tour connect?
whatIs.description: Tour connect is a revolutionary platform designed to empower tour guides and drivers across Sri Lanka. We bridge the gap between independent service providers and tourists seeking authentic, personalized experiences.

hero.successDescription: You've successfully secured your spot. We'll hit you up the moment it's your turn to dive in
hero.defaultDescription: Be among the first to experience Tour connect - the platform connecting tour guides and drivers with tourists. Join the waitlist to get notified when we launch.
hero.feedbackMessage: We want to build something you'll love! Share your thoughts and help us understand what features matter most to you.

benefits.title: Why Choose Tour connect?
benefits.subtitle: Empowering tour guides and drivers with the tools they need to succeed

pricing.title: Set Your Own Prices
pricing.description: You're in complete control of what you charge. No fixed rates.

noMiddlemen.title: No Middlemen
noMiddlemen.description: Direct connection between tourists and service providers.

earnings.title: Keep More Earnings
earnings.description: Fair commission structure means more money in your pocket.

flexible.title: Be Your Own Boss
flexible.description: Flexible schedule - work when you want, where you want.

reputation.title: Build Your Reputation
reputation.description: Ratings and reviews help you grow your business and attract more tourists.

payments.title: Secure Payments
payments.description: Safe, in-app payment system protects both you and your customers.
